tool.name: Minfi Get Beta

configfiles.configfile:
require("minfi", quietly = TRUE)
RSet <- get(load('$input1'))
beta <- getBeta(RSet)
write.table(beta, file = '$output1', quote = FALSE, sep = "\t")

tool.help: This tools outputs a matrix of methylation indices (beta values), which are continuous values between 0 and 1 representing the ratio/fraction of the intensity of the methylated-probe signal to the total signal intensity for each probed CpG site.
